original_title: 赤軍-PLFP 世界戦争宣言
overview: Adachi and Wakamatsu went to Beirut on the way back from the Cannes Film Festival. There, in collaboration with the Red Army members and PFLP, they produced this newsreel film depicting the everyday activities of Arab guerrillas as a cinematic narrative on the world revolution.
title: Red Army/PFLP: Declaration of World War
